title: 89/325/EEC: Commission Decision of 2 May 1989 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in the Basque country, Spain, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 2 May 1989
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in the Basque country, Spain, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Spanish text is authentic)
(89/325/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The measures adopted in the Basque country, Spain, pursuant to Article 16 of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 and contained in Decree No 295/1988 of 28 February 1989 satisfy the conditions for a Community financial contribution to the common measure provided for in Article 1 of the said Regulation.
This decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 May 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 108, 29. 4. 1988, p. 1.
